name: tpdiscord
description: Touch Portal Plugin for Discord using RPC

scripts.build-win: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move tpdiscord.exe base/Win/TPDiscord/ && del Installers\TPDiscord-Win.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPDiscord-Win.tpp TPDiscord && del TPDiscord\tpdiscord.exe
scripts.build-win-c: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move tpdiscord.exe base/Win/TPDiscord/ && del Installers\TPDiscord-Win-DiscordCanary.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPDiscord-Win-DiscordCanary.tpp TPDiscord && del TPDiscord\tpdiscord.exe
scripts.build-win-ptb: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move tpdiscord.exe base/Win/TPDiscord/ && del Installers\TPDiscord-Win-PTB.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPDiscord-Win-PTB.tpp TPDiscord && del TPDiscord\tpdiscord.exe
scripts.build-win-dev: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move tpdiscord.exe base/Win/TPDiscord/ && del Installers\TPDiscord-Win-DEVELOPMENT.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPDiscord-Win-DEVELOPMENT.tpp TPDiscord && del TPDiscord\tpdiscord.exe
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node12-macos-x64 . && move tpdiscord base/Mac/TPDiscord/ && del Installers\TPDiscord-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPDiscord-Mac.tpp TPDiscord && del TPDiscord\tpdiscord

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
